content:
Sure, here are a few affordable restaurants in New York City that you might want to check out:

1. Mamouns Falafel: This Middle Eastern hole-in-the-wall in Greenwich Village serves delicious falafel sandwiches and platters for under $10. 2. Artichoke Basille's Pizza: This pizza place offers some of the best slices of pizza in the city. They have several locations, including one in the East Village, and their prices range from $3.50 to $5.50 per slice. 3. Xi'an Famous Foods: This Chinese fast-food chain has several locations across the city and offers hand-pulled noodles and other tasty dishes for under $10. 4. Shake Shack: Known for their delicious burgers, Shake Shack has several locations in the city, and their prices range from $5 to $8 for a single burger. 5. Joe's Pizza: This West Village pizza joint is an NYC classic, and they offer affordable slices and whole pies starting at $3.75. 6. The Halal Guys: This street cart legend has expanded into several brick-and-mortar locations in the city, and they serve delicious gyro sandwiches and platters for under $10. I hope you find these recommendations helpful!
